Our Productions

Skyzdalimit's amazing cast members have been wowing audiences with their spectacular performances since 2010. Have a look at all the shows that we’ve put on over the years.

Grease the Musical

Adapted from the hit 70’s musical about a Summer High School romance between T-Bird Danny and new girl Sandy.

A Greek Wedding

Inspired by the musical Mamma Mia as Danny meets Sandy again 20 years later at a wedding in Greece.

A Musical Extravaganza

A series of scenes from the West End and Broadway’s biggest-selling musicals including.

Rocky

Inspired by the hit musical The Rocky Horror Picture Show as Brad and Janet find themselves in trouble as they seek help after their car breaks down at the bizarre residence of Doctor Frank-n-Furter.

Blues Sisters

The story is a tale of redemption for ex-convict Jake and his 'blood brother' Elwood, who set out on "a mission from God" to save from foreclosure the Catholic orphanage in which they were raised.

The Bishop

The show follows the misadventures of three Irish Roman Catholic priests who live in a parish on the fictional Craggy Island, adapted from the hit TV series Father Ted.

Love Me / Love Me Not

Adapted from High School Musical, a popular jock falls for a nerdy girl and has to hide his feelings when she transfers to his high school.

Happily Ever After

In the story, adapted from the Shrek film trilogy, an ogre, finds his swamp overrun by fairy tale creatures who have been banished by the corrupt Lord Farquaad.

The Prince of Africa

After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery. He is forced to return to avenge his father’s killer, his evil uncle, Scar. Inspired by The Lion King.
